oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mt. Olive MB: cornerstone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of cornerstone inlaid into brickwork. Inscription reads, "Mt. Olive Baptist Church, Organized 1897, Built in 1907, Burned in 1952, Rebuilt in 1954; Founder I.F. Brutton; Rev. W.R. Hall, Pastor."

Founder I.F. Brutton organized Mount Olive Missionary Baptist Church in 1897. A church building, constructed in 1907, burned in 1952. It was rebuilt by 1954. This building stands today adjacent to a fellowship hall on Barker Road in Atwood, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
